data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In some countries where you do not really experience consistent weather to divide this question into clothing for warm weather and cold weather is a bit pointless. You ____ not ____ plan ____ have a warm ____ hike ( tramp ). Have ____ basic ____ planning ____ the ____ the ____ can ____ at ____, ____ most ____ will ____ in Summer. If the sun comes out take off a layer or two and when you climb in altitude or a cold wind comes up put them on again with a rain coat as well.
data.partBlankContent: In some countries where you do not really experience consistent weather to divide this question into clothing for warm weather and cold weather is a bit pointless. You d_ not ev__ plan t_ have a warm wea____ hike ( tramp ). Have yo__ basic clot____ planning f__ the wo___ the s__ can th___ at y__, i_ most prob____ will ev__ in Summer. If the sun comes out take off a layer or two and when you climb in altitude or a cold wind comes up put them on again with a rain coat as well.
data.fullContent: In some countries where you do not really experience consistent weather to divide this question into clothing for warm weather and cold weather is a bit pointless. You do not even plan to have a warm weather hike ( tramp ). Have your basic clothing planning for the worst the sky can throw at you, it most probably will even in Summer. If the sun comes out take off a layer or two and when you climb in altitude or a cold wind comes up put them on again with a rain coat as well.
data.answer: 在一些国家，你并没有真正经历持续一致的天气，把这个问题分成温暖天气和寒冷天气的衣服是没有意义的。你甚至不打算在温暖的天气徒步旅行。做好最坏的打算，即使在夏天，天气也很可能会对你不利。如果太阳出来了，脱下一两层衣服，当你爬到高处或寒风袭来时，再穿上雨衣。
